description: Drink at least 8 glasses of water a day to keep your body hydrated. Proper hydration supports digestion, skin health, and overall bodily functions.
Aim for 7-8 hours of quality sleep each night. Quality sleep is essential for mental alertness, immune function, and overall physical health.
Include a variety of fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and lean proteins in your diet. A balanced diet provides essential nutrients for energy, immunity, and overall health.
Incorporate at least 30 minutes of moderate exercise into your daily routine. Physical activity boosts mood, improves cardiovascular health, and helps maintain a healthy weight.

Practice stress-reducing activities such as meditation, deep breathing, or yoga. Chronic stress can negatively impact both mental and physical health, so it's crucial to find healthy ways to manage it.
